hero.title: Build & Launch Your SaaS Faster Than Ever
hero.subtitle: LaunchPad Pro is a premium, bilingual, and fully responsive landing page template designed to convert visitors into customers.

features.title: Everything You Need to Launch with Confidence
features.subtitle: We've included powerful features to help you turn visitors into loyal customers.
features.bilingual_desc: With a single click, flip the entire template to support right-to-left languages like Arabic, opening up new markets for you.
features.responsive_desc: A perfect design on all devices, from the largest desktop screens to the smallest mobile phones.
features.fast_desc: Built with the latest technologies (Next.js) to ensure the fastest possible loading performance, improving UX and SEO.

how_it_works.title: Get Going in Three Simple Steps
how_it_works.subtitle: We designed everything to be easy and straightforward. Get started in minutes, not days.
how_it_works.step1_desc: Start by choosing the template that fits your brand and future vision.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Modify text, colors, and images to match your unique identity with just a few clicks.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Confidently publish your new website online and attract your first customers.

faq.title: Have Questions? We Have Answers
faq.subtitle: Everything you might need to know before making your decision.

items.question: What do I get when I purchase the template?
items.answer: You will receive the complete source code files for the project (Next.js + Tailwind CSS), along with clear documentation explaining how to modify and customize the template to fit your needs.

items.question: Do I need to pay a monthly or yearly subscription?
items.answer: Not at all. It's a one-time payment, and you get the template with all future updates for life.

items.question: What technologies is this template built with?
items.answer: The template is built with the latest technologies for the best performance: Next.js (a React framework) and Tailwind CSS for styling. It's ready to be deployed on platforms like Vercel or Netlify.

items.question: Can I use the template for commercial projects?
items.answer: Absolutely. When you purchase the Pro or Enterprise plan, you can use the template to build sites for your clients or for your commercial business without any restrictions.

cta.title: Launch Your Project to the World Today
cta.subtitle: Don't waste any more time coding from scratch. Get the professional template you need and start attracting customers now.

footer.tagline: A professional template to help you launch your next project faster and better.
